lead_paragraph: A complaint from a woman found to have a predisposition for breast cancer raises questions about whether employers can fire employees when they learn their genetic information
snippet: A complaint from a woman found to have a predisposition for breast cancer raises questions about whether employers can fire employees when they learn their genetic information

headline.main: Ex-Worker Says Her Firing Was Based on Genetic Test
headline.seo: Ex-Worker Says She Lost Job Because of Genetic Test
headline.print_headline: Ex-Worker Says Her Firing Was Based on Genetic Test
